headline: Northrop Grumman Announces Webcast, Conference Call of Fourth Quarter and 2024 Financial Results
summary: FALLS CHURCH, Va., Dec. 19, 2024 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Northrop Grumman Corporation (NYSE: NOC) announced today that its fourth quarter and full-year 2024 financial results will be posted on its investor relations website on January 30, 2025. Prior to the market opening, the company will issue an advisory release notifying the public of the availability of the complete and full text earnings release on the company’s website at http://investor.northropgrumman.com.
